semantic_description: Instrument RabbitMQ publish/consume operations so that Jaeger traces include dedicated spans with standard messaging.* attributes.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'queueName' variable passed to RabbitMQ.Client API

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'routingKey' parameter used in the publish call

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: literal 'send' for basic.publish or 'receive' for basic.deliver
